title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 May 2016 - XWiki
content:

11:18 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:29 <SputnikkCylon> has joined #xwiki  
11:30 <SputnikkCylon> hi all... looking around on JIRA it seems ldap referalls to a trusted domain should just work but it doesn't for me. Does anyone know what it takes to configure in XWiki?  
11:43 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
11:43 <lkrejci> has quit  
11:43 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
11:46 <acotiuga> has quit  
12:15 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:15 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
12:43 <vmassol> mflorea: I'm looking at http://jira.xwiki.org/secure/attachment/32610/macroToolbarIcon.png  
12:43 <vmassol> which one is the icon for inserting/editing macros? :)  
12:44 <vmassol> I hope users will find it easy to locate (since I couldn't figure it out)  
12:44 <vmassol> what is the icon "a <—> b" for btw?  
12:45 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:45 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
12:47 <mflorea> vmassol: the icon is similar to the icon used by the current WYSIWYG editor, and it is placed in the group of insert buttons (image, table, etc.).  
12:47 <mflorea> re the 'a <--> b', looks like replace to me  
12:48 <mflorea> http://ckeditor.com/addon/find  
12:48 <vmassol> ok  
12:49 <vmassol> so still don't know why one is the macro icon :)  
12:49 <mflorea> you will discover it :)  
12:50 <vmassol> maybe you could circle it in red on the screenshot/doc  
12:50 <vmassol> wanted to do it for you but since I don't know which icon it is...  
12:50 <vmassol> I'll leave it to you then :)  
13:10 <cjd> has quit  
13:10 <cjd\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:12 <vmassol> mflorea: I thought this was settings/config icon :)  
13:13 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
13:14 <mflorea> as I said above, the icon is similar to the icon used by the current editor (cog). Do you have a better suggestion for macro icon? It's not easy to find one that doesn't conflict with other features  
13:15 <vmassol> yes not easy  
13:15 <vmassol> maybe http://images.google.fr/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn2.iconfinder.com%2Fdata%2Ficons%2Fmedicine-3-1%2F512%2Fconclusion-512.png&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iconfinder.com%2Ficons%2F412014%2Fconclusion\_data\_document\_file\_note\_paper\_script\_icon&h=512&w=512&tbnid=x47wrXbcjn\_OgM%3A&docid=uRb8KujdaRXF9M&ei=wyBMV7yXMMmVaICrleAO&tbm=isch&iact=rc&uact=3&dur=474&page=1&start=0&ndsp=29&ved=0ahUKEwj8hM731YHNAhXJChoKHYBVBewQMwg1KAIwAg&bih=8  
13:15 <vmassol>  ?  
13:15 <vmassol> some other ideas: o+icon&espv=2&biw=1680&bih=833&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiEmr\_y1YHNAhVJrxoKHdPsCU0Q\_AUIBigB#tbm=isch&q=script+icon  
13:15 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:15 <vmassol> maybe http://images.google.fr/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn4.iconfinder.com%2Fdata%2Ficons%2Fazure-blue-icons%2F522%2Fscript\_file.png&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iconfinder.com%2Ficons%2F615052%2Fcode\_developpement\_file\_html\_programming\_script\_web\_icon&h=522&w=522&tbnid=De3jTPlZmueMHM%3A&docid=7uE9ae2eaMVX0M&ei=wyBMV7yXMMmVaICrleAO&tbm=isch&iact=rc&uact=3&dur=2969&page=1&start=0&ndsp=29&ved=0ahUKEwj8hM731YHNAhXJChoKHYBVBewQMwhXKBMwEw  
13:16 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:22 <mflorea> well, I didn't mentioned, but it should be from the icon set we're using, which is font-awesome at the moment (or glyph icons)  
13:22 <mflorea> http://fontawesome.io/icons/  
13:22 <mflorea> http://glyphicons.com/  
13:26 <mflorea> vmassol: regarding the code icon </> you suggested, macros are not about code. The users that will insert macros using the wizard are not technical.  
13:27 <mflorea> for simple users macros are like some gadgets/widgets that they can insert into the page  
13:28 <mflorea> I don't know what's the right icon for widgets/gadgets  
13:29 <mflorea> https://www.google.ro/?gws\_rd=cr,ssl&ei=6iNMV6XNEKTP6ASKmYCoDA#q=widget+icon  
13:29 <mflorea> :)  
13:29 <mflorea> the first 5 icons suggested are similar to what we use  
13:29 <mflorea> https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Widget\_icon.png  
13:32 <mflorea> I could also use http://fontawesome.io/icon/cogs/  
13:35 <mflorea> or http://fontawesome.io/icon/tachometer/ (normally used for dashboard, but since in our case dashboard gadgets are macros it could work)  
13:40 <cjd\_> has quit  
13:40 <cjd> has joined #xwiki

15:49 <flashdel> hi folks, i got one question: If i want to link to another internal site when editing a page, i click on "link" and go to the Tab "All Pages" i get a really long list of pages, where i can link to. Can i limit this list to display just the sites i want?
